Numbers are from January when numbers fluctuate according to winter severity.

bird_report.measures_taken: Hunting is based on an assessment of population levels carried out by Aarhus University: See www.dce2.au.dk/pub/SR66.pdf. Legally binding management plans including conservation priorities have been adopted for Danish Natura 2000 sites.
bird_report.further_information: www.naturstyrelsen.dk/Naturbeskyttelse/Natura2000/Natura_2000_planer/. The species is listed in nine Special Protection Areas (SPAs).
